channel.title: Democrats on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Democrats on PepsFeeder

item.title: Pete Buttigieg Dropped Out and It's Reshaping the Race
item.description: The once-enormous Democratic presidential primary field has suddenly gotten quite small Pete Buttigieg always thought a step ahead. With reporters, the former South Bend, Indiana mayor was deliberate in every word he spoke.

item.title: Trump impeachment case: a six-year "drama" with a farce behind it
item.description: Impeached by the House of Representatives and acquitted by the Senate … In just 50 days, Trump, the 45th President of the United States, experienced two very historic moments during his tenure.

item.title: Confusion in Iowa, Bernie Sanders claims to be leading
item.description: The results of the first primaries of the Democratic Party are slow to be official. The organizers mentioned “inconsistencies” in their collection of results. It is launch in pain.

item.title: Trump trial: Democrats take new measures, half Americans support president impeachment
item.description: Ten Democrats, led by Foreign Relations Committee member Bob Menendez, have called on Secretary of State Mike Pompeo to explain the reasons and motives behind the dismissal of former US ambassador to Ukraine Mary Jovanovich on the backdrop of pressures exerted by both Trump’s lawyers and his son to dismiss her because of her consistent position Detective later.
